description: Batter Team and Pitcher Team are switched for the entire game.
Batter Team and Pitcher Team are switched for the entire game.
The OBC for Fuzzy Dunlop's (ID: 382) Home Run in the Top of the 1st Inning should be 2 instead of 0. RBIs should be 2 instead of 1.
The OBC for Javier Tootblan's (ID: 192) Flyout in the Top of the 5th Inning should be 6 instead of 2.
The OBC for Formal Riot's (ID:299) Left Groundout in the Top of the 2nd Inning should be 6 instead of 2.
The gamelog is missing the final play of the game, a walk off 186 Diff Sacrifice Fly by Hudson Hildebrandt (ID: 284).
The gamelogs include an Auto BB by Bob Kelso (ID: 1834) in the Top of the 4th Inning. The plate appearance was replayed, but the original was not removed from the gamelogs.
